entry.title: papirosko/tasks_queue: A lightweight PostgreSQL-backed task queue system with scheduling, retries, backoff strategies, and priority handling. Designed for efficiency and observability in modern Node.js applications.

entry.title: KhaledObaidCubes/tree-structure-utils: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.

entry.title: JosephTJennings/coursera-gradecalc-extension: A lightweight Chrome extension that calculates and displays your current and projected grades on Coursera, based on weighted assignment scores. Instantly see your performance across graded and ungraded tasks directly within the Assignments page.
entry.content: A lightweight Chrome extension that calculates and displays your current and projected grades on Coursera, based on weighted assignment scores. Instantly see your performance across graded and ungraded tasks directly within the Assignments page.

entry.title: nisharga/smart-copy2clip: A lightweight React component that adds a simple copy-to-clipboard button to your app. Supports both strings and numbers. Includes dynamic icon feedback: a copy icon before clicking, and a checkmark icon after successful copy.
